name: Jabba The Hutt
Lore: 'Jabba Desilijic Tiure. Male heir to Zorba the Hutt. Gangster. Leader of one of the largest criminal organizations in the galaxy. Over six hundred years old.',
Text: 'Deploy -2 at Tatooine or Nal Hutta. To move requires +2 Force. May escort a captive. While at Audience Chamber, adds 1 to forfeit of all your other aliens and allows you to activate 1 Force for whenever you Force drain with an alien. Immune to attrition < 4.',
